content: Wow
easy and cheap clinging vines hey guys I have a plastic tray some
light green acrylic paint and some hemp string that I've cut to less than a foot
long so I'm just gonna water the green paint down and saturate the string with
it so I get that nice green color on the string right okay now those are dried up
I'm going to add some water down white glue to the string so I'll just put it
in this plastic tray here and then just swish it around and get it all over the
string you want to make sure the string is nice and saturated with the white
glue and then just start sprinkling my homemade flock if you haven't seen that
make sure you watch my video all over the string make sure it's nice and
covered there and then we'll let that dry out here on my cutting mat alright
it's cool I've done a bunch of those so sweet now I need to do one last thing
with these and what I'm going to do is I'm going to add another helping of the
white glue to this watered-down white glue because I want to make sure that
all these little flocking pieces stay to this string this will help secure them
to the string so I'm just gonna hit it again with a white glue and let it dry
and do all the other pieces now that those have dried I'm gonna start
applying these to my ruins here I've got some ruins here these are some elvish
ruins I'll be doing in a video here recent soot are soon actually so I'm
gonna Bend it up to a nice shape and then I'm gonna hit it in certain spots
with my hot glue just little dabs and just pop it right on the ruin there
and look how good that looks really great
now I'm not another piece here you can cut it to length and I'll just add a few
dabs there attach it to the other vine looking really really good really like
the effect of this another little piece here just glue it on there and bam
looking good here we go here's some elvish ruins that I have I put the vines
on and I'll have a bit on this later but they move Roderick here and give you a
closer look so here's the vines we did in the vid put on this tower I think
they really look great a nice cheap simple way to add really nice-looking
vines to your strut so very cool let's take a look at
something else here here's another ruin front and let's get
it Rodrick out of their scale so we got another vine come up the side here and I
just think this really came out good I'm just really happy with them and super
cheap and easy to do so there you go some vines for your ruins or other
buildings hey I hope you find these tips helpful if you did give your old DM
Scottie a thumbs up and that'd be alike also check out my forum and Facebook
group a bunch of wonderful people on there and if you do like these vids
consider tipping there is a little tip thing on the video you can click on that
and tip directly to your DM Scotty and if you want to go take it further than
that you can go to patreon and become a supporter and a member of the family I
have a monthly magazine called the crafters lair which will have instant
access to when you become a supporter take care
have fun gaming hey guys I want you to meet a personal friend of mine my cousin
